title: The Onset of Turbulence
body: Calculate the Reynolds numbers for the flow of water through (a) a nozzle with a radius of $$0.250$$ cm and (b) a garden hose with a radius of $$0.900$$ cm, when the nozzle is attached to the hose. The flow rate through the hose and nozzle is $$0.500$$ $$\frac{L}{s}$$. Can the flow in either possibly be laminar?
